channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP SQL Anywhere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP SQL Anywhere

item.title: CVE-2022-41259|2024-08-03T12:42:43.979Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20sql%20anywhere
item.description: SAP SQL Anywhere - version 17.0, allows an authenticated attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a SQL Anywhere database server by crashing the server with some queries that use an ARRAY constructor.

item.title: CVE-2022-35299|2024-08-03T09:36:44.352Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20sql%20anywhere
item.description: SAP SQL Anywhere - version 17.0, and SAP IQ - version 16.1, allows an attacker to leverage logical errors in memory management to cause a memory corruption, such as Stack-based buffer overflow.
